overview: It’s high summer on Fire Island and the Lucas Men know the best way to have a good time—by Breeding At The Belvedere! Edji Da Silva, Gabriel Phoenix, Max Adonis, Dylan James, Ruslan Angelo, Drake Masters, Max Arion, Manuel Skye, and Robert Law all get together and fuck hardcore in this two-part orgy. After the group fucking is over, Michael Lucas tops Jeffrey Lloyd. And Adam Killian barebacks with Dan Saxon!
title: Breeding At The Belvedere
